title: Relative motion-speed of ball on train

content.question: A train is moving to the east at <math alttext="25 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> relative to the ground. A passenger at the back of the train throws a ball to the west with an initial speed of <math alttext="15 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> relative to the train. What is the initial velocity of the ball relative to the ground?
